definition: unable to speak because of hereditary deafness, a device used to soften the tone of a musical instrument, deaden (a sound or noise), especially by wrapping
details:
adjective
- unable to speak because of hereditary deafness
= synonyms: dumb
- expressed without speech
= example: expressed without speech
= synonyms: tongueless, unspoken, wordless
noun
- a device used to soften the tone of a musical instrument
- a deaf person who is unable to speak
= synonyms: deaf-mute, deaf-and-dumb person
verb
- deaden (a sound or noise), especially by wrapping
= synonyms: dull
